com.fluidops.ajax.components

Class FLinkButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FButton
        • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FLinkButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener

    public abstract class FLinkButton
extends FButton
    A component which looks like a link but acts like a button, i.e., you can fetch the onClick java script event by implementing the onClick() method to this class just as in FButton. There also is no href attribute set and the page will not redirect or reload if the link button is being clicked.
    Author:
    cp
